trans-unit.resname: J15·1 | Temporal Manipulation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: Take an extra turn after this one.

trans-unit.source: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.
trans-unit.target: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

trans-unit.resname: J15·2 | Shardless Agent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

trans-unit.resname: J15·3 | Rishadan Port | Card Text | Paragraph 1
J15·3 | Rishadan Port | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Rishada is the gateway to free trade—but the key will cost you.
trans-unit.target: Rishada is the gateway to free trade—but the key will cost you.

trans-unit.resname: J15·4 | Ravages of War | Card Name
J15·4 | Ravages of War | Card Text | Paragraph 1
J15·4 | Ravages of War | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Thorn bushes spring up wherever the army has passed. Lean years follow in the wake of a great war."\n—Lao Tzu, *Tao Te Ching*,\ntrans. Feng and English
trans-unit.target: "Thorn bushes spring up wherever the army has passed. Lean years follow in the wake of a great war."\n—Lao Tzu, *Tao Te Ching*,\ntrans. Feng and English

trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

trans-unit.resname: J15·6 | Dualcaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
J15·6 | Dualcaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

trans-unit.source: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."
trans-unit.target: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

trans-unit.resname: J15·7 | Feldon of the Third Path | Card Name
J15·7 | Feldon of the Third Path | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.resname: J15·7 | Feldon of the Third Path | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target nonbasic land.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target nonbasic land.

trans-unit.source: The land was left depleted and empty, an unsettling taste of things to come.
trans-unit.target: The land was left depleted and empty, an unsettling taste of things to come.
